TopicTitle: Can you delete posts you made? And what about that weird bug that the forums was kinda all bullet pointed.

Articles.Content: Can you delete posts you made? And what about that weird bug that the forums was kinda all bullet pointed.

Forum members cannot delete their posts because that would be too easy to abuse. Say something rude, for example, then delete it. And the forum had some little hiccup yesterday but our IT guy was on it and got it fixed.

20 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

Forum members cannot delete their posts because that would be too easy to abuse. Say something rude, for example, then delete it. And the forum had some little hiccup yesterday but our IT guy was on it and got it fixed. 

Thanks IT guys!

@Dr. Kerbal,

You can ask for your own threads to be locked, though. And we even offer that as one of our many free services! 

We also offer free sarcastic and witty remarks, good natured kidding (or should it be kerbbing), and even an actual helpful answer sometimes! 

unfortunately, there's no upgrade for more advanced services or Jeb plushies...
